title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Z-Generation Nurse-Tailored Simulation/VR Nursing Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can handle complex patient scenarios in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve individual nursing skill deficiencies within three attempts using a personalized feedback system.
Learners achieve over 90% efficiency in real-time problem-solving with peer learners using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
